TopicTitle: Game Crashes when I recover a craft.

Articles.Content:
Ill post part of the log.

I initially though it was an issue with ram, but I when I used opengl it just crashes when loading.

Without opengl I don't crash on start up, but I can do 1 mission or 2 before it crashes. 

Anyone have any ideas.?

Thanks.

Unity Player [version: Unity 4.6.4f1\_99f88340878d]

mono.dll caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)

 in module mono.dll at 0023:1011940a.

Error occurred at 2015-06-30\_181906.

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe, run by Cesar.

77% memory in use.

0 MB physical memory [1823 MB free].

0 MB paging file [2247 MB free].

0 MB user address space [145 MB free].

Write to location 01000000 caused an access violation.

Showing the whole output\_log.txt (as suggested [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229)) instead of just a snippet of a log would certainly let us understand better what happens, and probably would also give away what are the add-ons you use. As is, you asked for help on this section (for modded installs) but let us no hint about what add-ons you have. 

Anyway, following all those troubleshooting steps from that thread I linked may already put you on the right track to solve the issue. In case not, provide a report as suggested there.
